text: Ian Michael Hamilton (31 October 1950 - May 2024) was an English footballer who played as a midfielder. He made more than 300 appearances in the Football League playing for Chelsea, Southend United, Aston Villa and Sheffield United, and more than 100 in the North American Soccer League for Minnesota Kicks and San Jose Earthquakes. He was nicknamed "Chico" after the jazz drummer. Hamilton died in May 2024 at the age of 73.Ex-midfielder Hamilton dies aged 73 ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Footballers from London Category:People from Streatham Category:Aston Villa F.C. players Category:Chelsea F.C. players Category:Sheffield United F.C. players
title: Ian Hamilton
